射頻應接器: radio frequency adapter {= rf adapter; RF adapter}

反射式高能電子繞射儀: reflection high energy electron diffractometer {= RHEED}

散射式近場掃描光學顯微鏡 {同 s-SNOM}: scattering near-field scanning optical microscope {= s-NSOM}

單光子發射電腦斷層掃描儀: single photon emission computed tomography {= SPECT}

單光子射出電腦加馬閃爍攝影機: single photon emission computerized gamma scintillation camera

小角度X光散射儀: small angle X-ray scattering spectrometer {= SAXS}

固態核磁共振儀: solid state NMR {solid state nuclear magnetic resonance spectrometer}
solid state nuclear magnetic resonance spectrometer {= NMR}

儲存陰極射線管: storage cathode ray tube {= storage CRT}

[電]容標[度]正比電容器: straight line capacity condenser {= SLC condenser}

表面磁光克爾效應測量儀: surface magneto-optical Kerr effect measurement system {= SMOKE}

總有機碳分析儀: total organic carbon analyzer {= TOC analyzer}

X射線全反射螢光光譜儀；X光全反射螢光光譜儀: total reflection X-ray fluorescence spectrometer {= TXRF}

橫向激發大氣[壓]雷射: transversely excited atmospheric laser {= TEA laser}

橫向激發大氣壓雷射: transversely excited atmospheric pressure laser {= TEAP laser}

調諧射頻式接收器: tuned radio frequency receiver {=tuned RF receiver; TRF receiver }
tuned RF receiver {tuned radio frequency receiver}

角調式橢圓光譜偏光儀: variable angle of incidence spectroscopic ellipsometer
